Title: Large Language Models and Computer Security
Abstract: large language models  large language model  are having a significant impact in many different fields. security and privacy issues related to large language model are of paramount importance. large language model can be used to defend against cyberattacks and thwart attackers. large language model can enhance computer security in several ways including identifying phishing attacks identifying malware analyzing incident reports from security breaches determining vulnerability to attacks analzying log information and providing valuable information education and training materials. however large language models can also be used by malicious parties to enhance cyberattacks. this paper looks at how large language model can be used by both defenders and attackers. we also examine attacks on large language models which have been deployed to cause large language model to output harmful information.
